Description:
Game Project CARS, tested and approved by the passionate fans of racing and real racers, also participated in its creation, is a racing simulator with a new generation which has absorbed an incredible combination of fan passion and professionalism of developers.

You will enjoy an incredible immersion in the game world is achievable thanks to advanced graphics and incredibly realistic controls, which allows excellent road feel. Create your own racer and take part in one of the many events that are available in a dynamic career mode. You can also become a new legend, competing in intense duels network.

Thanks to the huge selection of trails, the likes of which has not been in any racing game in recent years, innovative system of weather and changing time of day, setting up a deep and multi-purpose vehicles maintenance items that are available during the race, as well as the support of Oculus Rift and resolution 12K Ultra HD resolution , Project CARS simply leaves all possible rivals far behind.
